Package jam

Root package for the Jam software package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DirectoryFileFilter A way for FileDialogs to select only directories.
GateComboBoxModel Used anywhere a JComboBox is used to select from the available gates.
GateComboBoxModel.Mode Class representing the possible modes of GateComboBoxModel's.
HistogramComboBoxModel This class takes care of properly displaying the histogram chooser in Jam's main window.
HistogramListCellRenderer  
InitialHistograms This class to make initial histogram to display that is nice to look at.
JamCommand This class recieves the commands for all the pull down menues of JamMain.
JamConsole Class Console displays a output of commands and error messages and allows the input of commands using the keyboard.
JamMain Main Class for Jam.
PeakFindDialog Dialog for setting peak finding parameters.
RemoteAccess Allows remote access to histograms
RunControl Class for data acquistion and run control.
SetupRemote Class to make this process into a remote server for Jam or hookup to a remote online acquisition that is a server.
 

Exception Summary
JamException Exception that can be thrown by classes in Jam will be caught and the messeage will be output with a beep in the form: Error: errorMessage
 

Package jam Description

Root package for the Jam software package. Launch jam by executing the class jam.JamMain. The package also contains code for managing the overall Jam process, such as dialog boxes and jam.JamCommand which takes care of launching most tasks requested from the menus and buttons of Jam's main window.

See Also:
JamCommand, JamMain
